location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter No. 58: Lieutenant-Colonel Samuel Hennell, Resident in the Persian Gulf, Bushire, His Excellency Lieutenant-Colonel Justin Sheil, Her Majesty's Minister Plenipotentiary and Envoy Extraordinary at the Court of Persia, Tehran

mods.abstract: Samuel Hennell returns enclosures (not included) from Justin Sheil's despatch of 10 January 1850. This letter concerns custom duties extracted from Armenian merchants by the Government of Bushire. Hennell goes on to discuss duties in further detail, particularly those levied on Dutch merchandise.
